europeana:record.dc:title: Braueria 31 (2004)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Anonym , Beketov M.A., Bertuetti , Bohle H.W., Ceccagnoli Donatella, Chiappafreddo Umberto, Cianficconi Fernanda, Di Giovanni Maria Vittoria, Goretti Enzo, Ivanov Vladimir D., Kiss Ottó, Laudee Pongsak, Lodovici Omar, Malicky Hans, Melnitsky Stanislav I., Mey Wolfram, Neu Peter-J., Nimmo Andrew P., Serafin Edyta, Sipahiler Füsun, Speziale A., Stryjecki Robert, Valle Marco, Weaver III John S., Zsuga Katalin
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Hans Malicky: Dear Trichopterologist... 3. Anonym: Research workers on Trichoptera 4. Edyta Serafin, Robert Stryjecki: The living case of Silo pallipes (Fabricius, 1781) 4. John S. Weaver III: Jan Ladislav Sykora 5- 6. Anonym: News 6. Wolfram Mey: Wolfgang Joost (1937-2004) 7- 8. Anonym: Entomofauna Germanica 8. Anonym: SIEEC Award for Sarà Nógradi & Äkos Uherkovich 8. H.W. Bohle: Larval and pupal case building in Trichoptera: A comment to articles of G. B. Wiggins and H. Malicky in Braueria 27 and 28 9- 10. Fernanda Cianficconi, A. Speziale: The larvae of Potamophylax inermis MORETTI and ClANFlCCONl, 1994 and Potamophylax gambaricus spinulifer MORETTI, 1994 11- 12. Ottó Kiss, Katalin Zsuga: The water quality state in the middle section of River Tisza, Hungary 13- 19. Stanislav I. Melnitsky: A new species of Rhyacophila from the Caucasus (Trichoptera: Rhyacophilidae) 20. Pongsak Laudee: Life history and larval morphology of the Giant Microcaddisfly, Ugandatrichia kerdmuang MALICKY and CHANTARAMONGKOL 1991 (Hydroptilidae: Trichoptera) 21- 24. Bertuetti, Omar Lodovici, Marco Valle: Nuovi dati sui Tricottri italiani 25- 26. M.A. Beketov, Vladimir D. Ivanov: New data on the caddisflies (Trichoptera) of south-western Siberia 26- 28. Füsun Sipahiler: Descriptions of two new species of the genus Hydropsyche and some unknown females of Trichoptera (Rhyacophilidae, Hydropsychidae) 29- 31. Peter-J. Neu: European Conference on Trichoptera faunistics: Preliminary announcement 31. Andrew P. Nimmo: Photograph from the Second Symposium on Amphibiotic and Aquatic Insects of Russia, Voronezh, 15-17 September 2003, taken at the field station 'Venevitinovo' of Voronezh University. 32. Maria Vittoria Di Giovanni, Enzo Goretti, Umberto Chiappafreddo, Donatella Ceccagnoli: Weight and size of Italian Trichoptera fauna 33- 35. Hans Malicky: Neue Köcherfliegen aus Europa und Asien 36- 42. Hans Malicky: Trichopterological literature 43- 51
